original_text: And a man shall be as an hiding place from the wind, and a covert from the tempest; as rivers of water in a dry place, as the shadow of a great rock in a weary land.
korean_text: 또 그 사람은 광풍을 피하는 곳, 폭우를 가리는 곳 같을 것이며 마른 땅에 냇물 같을 것이며 곤비한 땅에 큰 바위 그늘 같으리니

sentences.original_text: And a man shall be as an hiding place from the wind
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 한 사람은 바람을 피하는 은신처가 될 것이니

sentences.original_text: and a covert from the tempest
as rivers of water in a dry place
as the shadow of a great rock in a weary land
sentences.korean_translation: 피곤한 땅에서 큰 바위의 그림자 같으리라
